website_summaries.verdict: Keep track of the entire family, courtesy of a popular electronics brand that has expanded its expertise to provide fast and accurate temperature recording.
pros: Lightning fast and simple to use by scanning over face to get reading
Stores information for up to 8 family members and provides treatment solution if fever is present
Syncs to more than one smartphone and does so quickly
cons: Won't provide an accurate reading if forehead is sweaty or there's not enough contact between thermometer and skin

customer_reviews.title: i was OBSESSED WITH IT, then it stopped working...
customer_reviews.text: this was my favorite product ever. But after 8 months of use it started showing only directions to the website with no temp readings. After about 15 emails with support over a course of 14 weeks and counting, they are blaming it on a software update to work with ios12 and it's been about 8 weeks since they've come to that conclusion with no update. In the middle of flu season with a 1 & 2 year old i'm embarrassed that I've spent $100 on a thermometer that hasn't worked in almost 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love it
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it, I really do, and I'd say it's fairly accurate because readings match my older thermometer, as well as old armpit thermometer. but unfortunately, every few uses, it just resets, and does nothing except send me to the thermo.withings.com until I reset it, remove from my account and re-setup it again. Happened 4 times over 1 week already and I'm fed up.
customer_reviews.author: Irakli Bibileishvili

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have need to take my temperature several times a day. This allows me to do it easily and reliably - just press the button and swipe it across my forehead! The thing I like is the digitization of those readings and how it shares with other programs, like Apple Health. I now have my own electronic health record with a history of my readings that I can share with my doctor. The batteries are easy to change. Finally, the unit is able to go through a lot of stress. I fly across the country weekly and my thermometer accompanies me on every trip.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer needs to be connected to your phone, which is a bad requirement from the start. Then it needs to periodically reconnect which it does not do easily, I've tried for 2 days now. I have 2 of these, both brand new and I can't use either. I have a small medical practice and they both are asking to be set up again through the phone and their website. Neither will connect again and there is no customer service number for the company. Poor customer support, still waiting for an email back. This system does not work, do not rely on it through this COVID-19 crisis.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Sogaard

customer_reviews.title: WiFi Thermo Works Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works flawlessly. I bought this for my family member whose temperature must be monitored and recorded every day. Since the task of recording the temperature is too much for the family member to do, I needed a thermometer that would record temperatures and do so without being connected via Bluetooth to a device (family member has no phone or other device with Bluetooth). Since this connects via WiFi, it is the perfect solution. It also allows me to monitor her temperature remotely when I’m at work. The thermometer is also very accurate. I have no complaints at all regarding the device and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful accuracy.  You must download the app to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is very accurate as I tested the accuracy with an in mouth thermometer. Not only that, it’s extremely easy to use. I give 4 stars due to the fact that it’s mandatory to download the app to use this. With that said, although I don’t mind at all, and I love this feature, I’m sure some will not like that aspect. I like that you can customize the names of your family members and log each temp to a specific person, and it stores it under name, date, and time in the app! Great, accuracy, and great device!
customer_reviews.author: ɴᴋ

customer_reviews.title: Intrusive setup required
customer_reviews.text: Requires you to register for an online account before you can even use the thing. Requires you to send Withings your data. Temperature varies significantly between readings.
customer_reviews.author: krism

customer_reviews.title: Can't create account = can't use this very expensive thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could tell you how well this thermometer works. Unfortunately, the App gives an error of a connectivity issue, and the web site says Internal Error (Galaxy S10, Google Chrome, MS Edge all will not work, so its not on my end). And since you can't use this thermometer WITHOUT registering it online, this is useless. Withings, please get your act together and I'll be happy to change this review. But this is garbage. A total waste of my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Erik W. Marksberry

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Literally. Software doesn’t talk to the firmware. Mine updated immediately out of the box, changed the Nokia web address on the splash screen to withings and then... told me it needed to be updated. I sent it back. Waste of time. Give them a few years to digest Nokia health but in the mean time, don’t buy this device. It may have worked once, but it is highly unlikely to work again. Think red headed stepchild.
customer_reviews.author: teamnoir

customer_reviews.title: Great device for the traveling medical professional.
customer_reviews.text: I travel all over the world extensively for my job as a paramedic. I bought this device to carry in my personal medical kit. I have used this thermometer and it is so easy to use and read. I like the portability of it as well as the ability to keep, track, and trend the results on the app. I use this device in conjunction with the new Kardia EKG device for quick diagnostic information in places where I am unable to carry a full life pack monitor. I recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lee Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, quick read and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After having issues trying to find a thermometer to gives accurate, consistent results, I finally ended the struggle. Not only is it quick and easy to use, but the app is wonderful for tracking temps and you can even set reminders when tracking fevers. This is a wonderful thermometer especially with small children. My 18 month-old is asthmatic and gets sick frequently so this is something I definitely wish we would have had from day one. Definitely worth paying a little more than a basic thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: A Great Component of the Withings Ecosystem
customer_reviews.text: If you're not attached to a "wearables" suite, I'd suggest the Withings ecosystem. Their watches are classy, priced excellently, and offer all the sensors yous want/need. Their BP Monitors are easy to use and accurate (enough). Their Smart Weight Scales are the best on the market. And this thermometer has to be one of the best, if not the best, smart thermometers on the market. Combining any of the products gives a nice picture of any daily health metrics you may need to care about. Additionally, their app syncs nicely with most apps from Health Care providers, allowing your doctors to review the data in the lead-up to any appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty getting the Thermo to pair with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I would like to be able to turn this device on and take my temperature, but about every other time I decide to use it, it says "setup" even though it has been set up. Turning the Thermo off and on a few times and turning my iPhone off and on a few times seems to work, but by the time I get the Thermo going, my temperature has probably risen a degree or two from the aggravation. So... GREAT when it works! Aggravating when it doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: Ilene Frank

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: After going through all the steps to set up the thermometer, I took my temperature 10 times in a row. None of the readings were the same and they varied by two full degrees at times. Not accurate at all. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Not plug-and-play
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work unless it’s hooked up through the app and the app is super creepy about requiring use of your personal data. Way to expensive for something that questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and is cool technology. It's great that you can take a sleeping child's temperature without even touching them. I like how it stores everyone's temperature history and shows if you have a fever based on your age and height/weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bakersworld

customer_reviews.title: No iOS 14 updates, app will not work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this thermometer for over a year. I like the ability to type symptoms and medications used at the time of a reading on the app. This is useful for recounting a period of fever or illness to the family doctor. However the app recently stopped working. I’m unable to reinstall the thermometer and there is no response from Withings. Without the app you can’t use the thermometer. It may be an issue with iOS 14 but there haven’t been any app updates in over a year.
customer_reviews.author: B B

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage, skip it
customer_reviews.text: The app is terrible. Also the app is separate from the other Withings health app and you cannot add this to the Withings heath app as a new device. I took 10 readings in the same spot and got 10 different readings that were 5 degrees different. Too lazy to return this trash. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: CPT_Walt

customer_reviews.title: The best thermometer, toddler hates all others
customer_reviews.text: My toddler HATES having her temperature taken any way. With this, at least I can take it while she's sleeping or watching a show and she doesn't notice it's happening, because you don't even need to touch her skin. Unlike the ear thermometers (which you have to point exactly to the same spot every time), this is accurate every single time. Unlike any other thermometers, this is very very fast. Seriously a top 2 product for a new parent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last.. no response to email and no phone number to call
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February.. by May the batteries had to be replaced and it basically stopped syncing to my phone despite resyncing.. and now does not work at all.. the manufacturer does not have a phone number to call at this time for getting it replaced under the 1year warranty.. and they don’t respond to email. Extremely frustrating considering the cost and having to do mandatory temperature checks for kids to attend activities.. and now we have to find a new thermometer.. this company should be replacing or refunding money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni L Masi

customer_reviews.title: Careful maybe sending your data without app!!!
customer_reviews.text: A sniffer on my Wi-Fi caught my thermometer connecting to my Wi-Fi on its own while in the drawer—no phone connected. I wonder if it is sending data of some type. I don’t recall giving it access to my network. I can only guess it got my network credentials from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Excelsior

customer_reviews.title: Tracks history on phone!
customer_reviews.text: We have to submit our daughters' temperatures for school every morning, so I wanted an accurate and easy to use thermometer. I also have a toddler who won't sit still long, so I needed something quick. This product is awesome! I created a profile for each member of our family and I can save each person's temperature to their account, and then I can access the data on a phone app. It also allows me to record medication given (date/time/amount) for each family member. And you don't even have to touch the forehead (so I can take temps while kids sleep). So convenient!!
customer_reviews.author: MBB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my 3rd one for DIL expecting her first baby. I gave my other DIL these as gifts several years ago and they still use them.. Keeps profiles for each member of the family
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The device is easy to use and is accurate. A good item to have during this health crisis. Temperature readings are important and this item provides quick results for both my wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hulsman

customer_reviews.title: The best!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sick child that requires constant care and her temperature needs to be checked all the time and this is perfect because it tells me whether or not the nurses are doing her job in taking her temperature because I get alerts every time they do. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to get a very quick temperature check and you don't need your phone to do it.
customer_reviews.text: It is very simple to use, place it on your forehead, and swipe across to the side. Look at the unit and it shows your temperature. It's simple to use on yourself to get your temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with 5 G WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it doesn't work with 5G WiFi. Perhaps I missed it but I did not see that in the description prior to purchase. Again, may have been user error but nonetheless it would not connect to my WiFi so I returned it. Maybe they have updated the tech and problem is cleared but too late for me.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Thermometer On the Market
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. So easy to setup. So easy to use. Love that it saves my data. Only downside is that the Thermo ap doesn't send the data to the Healthmate app. That would make 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DBG

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and I love that the reading goes to my phone and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and I love that the reading goes to my phone and I can set up an app for each child to record fevers for each sickness. You can even record the time you gave them Tylenol or Motrin and keep track of their symptoms. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Snorman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: The device was easy to set up and convenient to use. I found the readings to be accurate if used consistently and properly (nice straight line from the middle of your forehead towards your hairline, aiming to scan the temporal nerve, not your hair).
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favourite Product at Home!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favourite home product. Super useful especially with babies or toddlers around when you need to broadcast temperature and medicine feeding times while reviewing temperature trends via the app with my wife or others installed with the thermo app. I bought another one for my brother who's enjoying it too!
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. App allows you to track the temperature, but you can also add symptoms for each record. This gives you a timeline of temperatures and you can see if things get better or worse over time. There is a profile for each family member so it's easy to monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: New baby must have
customer_reviews.text: Must have for babies. So freaking fast and painless. I love that it logs everything into the app automatically. The fact that it’s FSA/HSA eligible is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing you can buy. Literally it says that my child has a fever. Constant fever that is. It's always showing a high temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Eden T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to use. You only need to simply point the product to your forehead and move horizontally to one side. The app is well designed. You can create profiles for different family members and the measurement can be synced to the right person.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cai

customer_reviews.title: I thought I might be crazy spending this much on a thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased MULTIPLE thermometers to use on my family and none of them have been accurate. This is the only one I have come across that's easy to use that is completely accurate and I don't have to stick it up anyones butt.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, I loved it. Sleek design. Clear display. But I took my temperature 5 times in a row and got 5 wildly different readings. Returning it and requesting a refund
customer_reviews.author: Linda Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Easy to use. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Glkibe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as you would think. You need to download the application then update it which is done automatically. Then you need to creat profiles and then you can start using it. But over all I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Partovi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this so much
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this so much. Debated making the purchase for a while, so glad I ended purchasing it. After almost two weeks of sick family members, this thermometer was so helpful keeping track of fevers and medications. It is very accurate, and easy to use. Buy it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works fast and accurately
customer_reviews.text: I've bought into the whole Withings ecosystem... scale, watch, BP, and now the thermometer. It all incorporates well into their Health Mate app. This device in particular gets the temp fast and the ability to insert notes about condition or environment into the app is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Sandan KenpoTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: 4 month life
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months. I spoke with seller and the manufacturer, both refused to do anything. Waste of money, don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran

customer_reviews.title: Must have product.  Expensive, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It is easy to use and I can track different users on my cell phone. It seems accurate. It was useful in tracking and diagnosing my flu.
customer_reviews.author: Redreed

customer_reviews.title: Great product. BAD APP.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive product. The app seems very buggy and is difficult to setup sometimes. I had to re-setup the thermometer 3 times in order to access all of the features and to enable it to function.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Useless without giving manufacturer your personal information.
customer_reviews.text: This device is unusable unless you surrender your personal information to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: MisterMister

customer_reviews.title: Effortless and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Best connected thermometer. Syncs flawlessly with app. Accommodates multiple users for repeated measurements. Beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Can't get started, so useless to me.
customer_reviews.text: Can't use without registering online account, installing app and wrestling through tech issues. I just want to know if I have a fever. Don't have time or patience to deal with this. Some things really should just stay simple. Sending this back ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: E Spatz

customer_reviews.title: It’s accurate, fast, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer for the household and it tracks the temperatures well. I like I can see how each of us are doing. It takes very accurate measurements. And it does this so quickly. I like that. It is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Product not for the non tech savy.
customer_reviews.text: nice little thing. i like how it saves your temps with the times and you can add if you gave any medicine, etc. good feature to show a medical professional if need be. a little complicated if you dont like technology. you have to download an app before you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pazo

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Inacurate
customer_reviews.text: This is not accurate at all always runs high. But also you can do the same measurement 5 times and get 5 different readings. I wanted to love it but it’s terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos Coordinator

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer was a little glitchy setting up but seems to work fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: No off button
customer_reviews.text: It stops working after you use it once. Seems to need batteries. Changed them. Used once that day. . Then the next day it won’t go on. What’s up????!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Margaret

customer_reviews.title: The best in my days!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased just about every brand of thermometers. My last fav was one I bought at Costco By far this is better in every way. Major upgrade. After seeing this in the Apple store (I was getting my phone repaired) I knew I had to try it. Of coarse Amazon has it at a better price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: N. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer with battery problems
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer but it keeps requiring a fresh set of batteries every week. Turn it off, yet after the week, it won’t turn on. However, the app would say there still is a battery charge. What gives?!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take readings
customer_reviews.text: The app is annoying to set up but works fantastic when you are trying to monitor a sick child. It is so easy to see the past readings and treatment notes. The thermometer is easier to use than another temporal one I had and seems to be more accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Pauling

customer_reviews.title: Love the Withings products, accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it has an on-board display as well as connect to WiFi and that all my measurements are logged into my account. Super easy to use and it also supports multiple people so each one can track their temperature over time. The THERMO app also works great and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean J. Labrosse

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate/Inconsistent Readings
customer_reviews.text: I really love the design but can not get consistent readings at all. I can do one reading and turn right around a do a second one that differs by 1-1.5 degrees. I have no idea which reading to believe as they change each time. That makes the device effectively worthless now and I’m beyond my return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harris

customer_reviews.title: Use It With Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Checked the accuracy of Them against my Doctor offices equipment. Spot on. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cespedeswyatt

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. I work in the medical field so it’s no contact design is excellent. Easy to use and easy to read. I do love that it will save readings in the app and let you assign it to a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. We have used it many times to quickly make sure our son is at the right temperature. It's helped us know when to adjust the room temperature or his clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: No more shared thermometers under the tongue!
customer_reviews.text: I love how I can add my entire family and link to my Smart phone. I did require a little bit of help from my teen to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marie Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Consistent and intuitive
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you do it the way it says and it seems to be pretty consistent. I also like that it supports multiple users in an intuitive way. The Withings blood pressure cuff did not do such a great job at that so I was a little worried but this thermometer is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Nova

customer_reviews.title: Easy for multiple patients daily
customer_reviews.text: So nice compared to4 different brands that quickly broke down .. sanitary usage
customer_reviews.author: nursebethat

customer_reviews.title: Great temporal thermometer!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great app, easy to setup and use! Wish I had it months ago!!
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: We use it all the time! You can program it for more than 1 person and track all the results on a phone! Super easy to use with infants!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable and useless
customer_reviews.text: Nice gadget but that's all. The readings are not accurate compared to old school methods. You just can't trust the device. Note reliable and therefore completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Accurate not sure tried three different temp. All gave me different readings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must-have!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! So easy and fun to use. It records the readings on my phone so effortlessly and a newborn's parent definitely needs that as it takes off one of the many things that parents must do but cannot do.
customer_reviews.author: ATSUKO S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and goes to the app if WiFi connected. The only thing missing in this product is accuracy. I have compared with conventional oral thermometer collecting data for 1 month. It definitely reads higher than it should be +1.0~2.0°F. But it is precise so you could see the differences when you have fever.
customer_reviews.author: Hirotaka Sato

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the thermometer amazing. It reports my state to my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Machisen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for parents.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this. It makes managing colds and flu and everything else. I love the different profiles and the app. Allows me to see fever trends to know if my kids need medical attention.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Miller

customer_reviews.title: Brought it for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: my son and daughter in law love technology so this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great Smart Thermometer that is beautifully designed
customer_reviews.text: What a great Smart Thermometer that is beautifully designed. It is so simple to use and it takes only 3-5 seconds to get your temperature taken. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Menard

customer_reviews.title: Good Display,Accurate measurement,Worth for money and Easy to carry while travelling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use,Excellent Thermo,Temperature is very accurate. We can store the whole family body temperature individually through mobile app. Reading LED is very bright. Worth for money.
customer_reviews.author: Siva.K

customer_reviews.title: Not always accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not too accurate that often. Oral thermometer is more consistent. And cheaper. Sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device, it has already allowed us to address minor fever in our family. It is so great to have an accurate device that does not require constant sterilization!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good- a Mom must have
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one. I love it but it only lasts about a year with constant use. I have not been successful hooking it to WiFi however pretty easy to hook to Bluetooth which is plenty good enough to use all feature. Easy to use and app is very friendly and modernized interface. I would recommend it. I’ve had A few brands
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: The reading not that accurate as been tested several times ...
customer_reviews.text: The reading not that accurate as been tested several times. There is one degree less than the normal thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed  El Morr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take accurate readings for babies
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really seem to work well on our infant. We wish it did.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S Marks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It is so easy to use and defined recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent temperatures, awkward self-measurement
customer_reviews.text: Design makes it difficult to use on yourself. You can't tell how close to your forehead to put it. Temperatures were all over the place, not consistent. The app was interesting and well-designed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Tracks the family easily and makes knowing easier the next steps to take when a fever hits
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Must-have Grandparent Toolbox basic. Handles grandkids from six months through teens, old folks a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, accurate, a must-have tool for any grandparent. Even our four year old granddaughter can take her new little brothers temp.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. McLarty

customer_reviews.title: High Tech Thermometer is Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and quick way to get a highly accurate scan of one's temperature. Especially great if you have kids. Connection to app helping in tracking temperature changes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Consistently inconsistent  :(
customer_reviews.text: I consistently get temp readings that vary from 100 - 103 on the same kid, at the same time, doing the same motion just like the instructions say. I wish I would not have spent the money on this.
customer_reviews.author: meeccles

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: We tried every which way to use this thermometer and it just won’t work. Tried to reach out to company and never heard from them and now they won’t accept our return. The thermometer never worked from day one. Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Bronsen Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Fast. Accurate. Easy to use. Setup was a little clunky, didn’t want to pickup the WiFi at first. But seems to be ok now. Like the tracking in the app.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great item for use on kids. Accurate and records history
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cabassa

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate. Home health care nurse asked us if she could try it on our great grandson. She like it so much she ordered one that day!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson P. Benton

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer does not stand by product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but it stopped working 13 mo after purchase. Warranty is 12 mo. Manufacturer gave me some trouble shooting and a coupon code but for $100, 1 mo out of warranty I would expect a new product.
customer_reviews.author: EMB

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy to use, fun!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fast and contact-less measurements make Thermo an incredible tool, a hands down winner. Very easy to setup with Thermo App, a step by step wizard guides you all the way to setting up all family members or users. Thermo app allows comments, medicine log and pictures for every reading. It will have you reading temperature all days just because it's easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge M. Nieto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It's not accurate !
customer_reviews.text: If you measure closely, reading temp. is too high. If it's a bit far from your forehead, reading is too low. Difficult to find the right spot to measure properly.
customer_reviews.author: Seiich

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast, accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, fast, accurate. Bought this primarily for my daughter who adores it and wants to have her temperature taken all the time. The whole family now uses it though. Wonderful to even be able to check in on everyone when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and fast thermometer. And the automatic historical tracking is great, especially for monitoring ovulation and pregnancy
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but weak app
customer_reviews.text: For some strange reason it's separate primitive app instead of integrating it in HealthMate
customer_reviews.author: Serhii

customer_reviews.title: but this one is great!! Easy and provides comfort in knowing it ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I've never had confidence in taking ac accurate temp on my boys. I've always had temporal thermometers, but this one is great!! Easy and provides comfort in knowing it is correct. The app connect is great when they're sick, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very accurate. Doesn't need additional ear cups or sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly simple to use and I love the app notifications.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hurt

customer_reviews.title: inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had returned it when I could. Totally inaccurate. everyone has either a 96.5 or 96.8 temp.
customer_reviews.author: J F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for everybody
customer_reviews.text: Easy for use but first time is make me fuse when change people who measure.
customer_reviews.author: Jukrin Somboonjun

product_meta.title: Withings Thermo – smart Temporal Thermometer, FSA-Eligible, Suitable for Baby, Infant, Toddler & Adults
product_meta.description: Style:New versionNow a fast, effortless gesture yields accurate results and provides an automatic sync with the dedicated app. In app you can track temperature readings, get reminders, and input related symptoms & medications for advice right on your smartphone.Storage conditions :Temperature: -25°C to +55°C (-13°F to 131°F) Humidity: Between 15% and 95% ; Power supply :2x 1.5V LR03 AAA alkaline cells ; Operating environment Temperature: 10°C - 40°C (50°F - 104°F) Humidity: Between 15% and 95%
feature_bullets: FSA-ELIGIBLE ITEM - If you have a flexible spending account with your employee health plan, no doctor’s prescription is needed to purchase a Thermo smart temporal thermometer
HIGH PRECISION - Thermo has 16 infrared sensors that take over 4000 measurements to provide a highly-accurate result
QUICK & EASY - Ultra-fast measurement with color-coded fever indicator

AUTOMATIC SYNCHRONIZATION - Data from every measurement and health advice appears in the Withings Thermo app automatically via Wi-Fi (iOS and Android) . iOS compatibility (iOS 8 and higher), Android compatibility (6.0 and higher)
MULTI-USER FRIENDLY - Up to 8 users can access their personal temperature history with the ability to share with their health professional
Nokia Health is now Withings. Same products, same team, same commitment to your health. For more information, contact our support.
Withings products on Amazon must be “ships from and sold by” Amazon or Withings to be eligible for warranty/replacement by Withings.
